mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE CATEGORY<>'공지'
SELECT NUM, SUBJECT, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD DAY PM HH:MI:SS') REGDATE, READCOUNT, WRITER, IP, ID, CATEGORY, ROWNUM FROM NOTICE WHERE CATEGORY='공지' ORDER BY NUM DESC

SELECT NUM, SUBJECT, CONTENT, REGDATE, READCOUNT, WRITER, IP, ID, CATEGORY, RNUM FROM ( SELECT NUM, SUBJECT, CONTENT, REGDATE, READCOUNT, WRITER, IP, ID, CATEGORY, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT NUM, SUBJECT, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD DAY PM HH:MI:SS') REGDATE, READCOUNT, WRITER, IP, ID, CATEGORY FROM NOTICE WHERE CATEGORY<>'공지' ORDER BY NUM DESC ) ) WHERE RNUM>=#{startRow} AND RNUM<=#{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(NUM, SUBJECT, CONTENT, REGDATE, READCOUNT, WRITER, IP, ID, CATEGORY) VALUES(#{num},#{subject},#{content},SYSDATE,0,#{writer},#{ip}, #{id}, #{category})
